titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the week of April 9, 2023, through April 15, 2023, as "National Young Audiences Arts for Learning Week".
Expressing support for the designation of the week of April 9, 2023, through April 15, 2023, as "National Young Audiences Arts for Learning Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Young Audiences Arts for Learning Week.
